jobs.title: Business Development Representative
jobs.description:
Squared.io is an advertising automation platform for Google Ads.


We help Enterprise Advertisers automate processes usually carried out by humans in order to save time, improve performance and gain competitive advantage. At Squared.io we want to democratise advertising by creating software to make it simple to manage lots of campaigns and keep on top of things. 


We have also won a few awards!: 

• UK Biddable Media Awards - 2017 - Technology Innovation Of The Year 

• UK Biddable Media Awards - 2018 - Technology Innovation Of The Year 

• The Drum Search Awards USA - 2018 - Best Software Innovation 

• UK Search Awards - 2018 - Best Software Innovation 

• Interactive Marketing Awards - 2019 – Innovation 

• The Drum Search Awards - 2019 - Best Search Software 


To help support our vision, we are looking for a smart, ambitious people-person with a passion for technology. This is a unique opportunity to join a rapidly growing and widely respected organisation that has enormous market potential. 


What You’ll Do

Manage a large volume of daily outbound leads - connecting via phone, email and LinkedIn and qualifying them.
Engage with Sales and Customer Success teams to design, research and execute outbound vertical and/or geographical markets campaigns to grow sales pipeline in a dedicated territory.
Work with our Sales Executives to prospect and help close large enterprise deals
Educate and nurture early-phase prospects for potential future opportunities
Demonstrate knowledge of Squared.io and its value proposition and an understanding of the Brand/Agency ecosystem to converse with leaders across those organisations.
Analyse and report on your weekly activities to identify potential optimisations
Maintain accurate Customer records in Hubspot

Who You Are

You have strong interpersonal skills and excellent verbal and written communication skills in English
You have some relevant experience and proven success in sales or business development.
Experience working in the software / tech industry or in a startup is desirable.
You have demonstrated organizational and project management skills with the ability to handle pressure and a high volume of tasks in a result-oriented environment
You are analytical and understand the need to track everything you do
You are really interested in innovative technologies.

If you think the above description sounds great to you, or if you are interested in being part of the Squared.io growth story, send your resume along with an email explaining why you’re interested in this role to careers@squared.io.

jobs.title: Senior Sales Manager/Director
jobs.description:
Squared.io is an advertising automation platform for Google Ads.


We help advertising agencies and large advertisers automate processes usually carried out by humans in order to save time, improve performance and gain competitive advantage. Google and Facebook will represent $170bn of advertising spend in 2019 and that number is growing fast. 

Running advertising campaigns is hard and has traditionally been done by experts with years of experience. At Squared.io we want to democratise advertising by creating software to make it simple to manage lots of campaigns and keep on top of things. 


A couple of things we're rather proud of: 

• We can save 12 hours a week of account manager time per client so our customers can get rid of the drudgery of campaign management and spend time on the interesting stuff like strategy 

• We are used by some of the largest advertising agency groups in the world like GroupM, Omnicom and Havas from Mumbai to Mexico City. 


We have also won a few awards!: 

• UK Biddable Media Awards - 2017 - Technology Innovation Of The Year 

• UK Biddable Media Awards - 2018 - Technology Innovation Of The Year 

• The Drum Search Awards USA - 2018 - Best Software Innovation 

• UK Search Awards - 2018 - Best Software Innovation 

• Interactive Marketing Awards - 2019 – Innovation 

• The Drum Search Awards - 2019 - Best Search Software 


To help support our vision, we are looking for a smart, ambitious people-person with a passion for technology. This is a unique opportunity to join a rapidly growing and widely respected organisation that has enormous market potential. (Did we mention an opportunity to have a load of fun as well?) 


Who we’re looking for: 

● A self-starter with the right energy and mindset to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic and flexible working environment 

● Experience selling high ACV SaaS deals to Enterprise Brands and Media Agencies.

● Someone who is energized by personal interactions and thrives on building long term relationships 

● An excellent communicator who possesses strong interpersonal skills as well.

● Proficient in Word, Excel, Powerpoint and sales CRM such as Salesforce/Hubspot.

● Proven track record of regularly achieving target.

● Experience selling to Media Agencies (Big 6), Retail, FinServ, Travel highly desirable.

● Knowledge of adwords, paid social etc highly desirable.


Enterprise Sales Rep’s roles and responsibilities: 

• Actively prospect and identify new opportunities within the market 

• Manage an active sales pipeline ensuring monthly/quarterly targets are achieved 

• Maintain ongoing relationships with both prospects and current clients 

• Collaborate with Marketing and Customer Success in order to identify new opportunities and areas of growth for Squared.io 

• Represent Squared.io in a professional manner at industry and company hosted events 

• Maintain accurate client records in Sales CRM



If you think the above description sounds great to you, or if you are interested in being part of the Squared.io growth story, send your resume along with an email explaining why you’re interested in this role to careers@squared.io.
